lead_paragraph: Justin Morneau, out since July 7 with a concussion, took batting practice for the first time in more than a month and put on a show.
snippet: Justin Morneau, out since July 7 with a concussion, took batting practice for the first time in more than a month and put on a show.

headline.main: Morneau Hopes to Return if Twins Reach A.L.C.S.
headline.seo: Morneau Hopes to Return if Twins Reach A.L.C.S.
headline.print_headline: Morneau Hopes To Return if Twins Reach A.L.C.S.
